title: Three brokers blast terms for SeaLink raising
text:
SeaLink Travel Group has kicked off a $154 million equity raising to help fund its $635 million bid for Transit Systems Group.

Brokers Macquarie, Ord Minnett and Taylor Collison sent terms to fund managers on Tuesday morning.

The raising was split into a $65 million placement and $89 million rights issue.

New shares were for being offered at $3.50 each which was a 10.5 per cent discount to the last close and a 7.7 per cent discount to the theoretical ex-rights price, according to the term sheet.

The brokers were calling for bids into the placement and institutional portion of the raising by close of business on Tuesday.

The raising was underwritten by the three brokers.
description: SeaLink Travel Group has kicked off a $154 million equity raising to fund its $635 million bid for Transit Systems Group.
